name: immovable objects (Neurotypique, short_demand)
description:
"Zelda's packed all the rooms except her bedroom. There are some important things she doesn't know if she should keep. Could you help her pack?"

Your soon-to-be roommate has a hard time deciding what to keep from her childhood's bedroom.  You won't have room for everything, so search her bedroom and try to make her pick what you'd see fit in your future shared room.

What better way to influence her than reminding her of fond memories linked to the objects, hoping she'll keep them out of Nostalgia!
